title: Hostel UNRATED (2005) PAL DVD9
description:
Hostel UNRATED (2005)
---------------------
"Welcome To Your Worst Nightmare."

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0450278/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0450278/</a>

Audio: English, Polish, Czech, Hungarian.

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Icelandic, English, Arabic, Bulgarian, Greek, Hebrew, Hindustani, Croatian, Polish, Romanian, Slovenian, Czech, Turkish, Hungarian.

Extra Materials:
- Commentary with Director Eli Roth and Executive Producers Quentin Tarantino, Boaz Yakin and Scott Spiegel.
- Making of Hostel Dissected: Part 1-3.
- Multi-Angle: Kill the Car!
- Trailers.


Plot outline:
Paxton, Josh and Oli are backpacking across Europe when they are told about a hostel in Slovakia. Once they hear that this hostel is infested with beautiful European woman who only want tourists, they quickly get on a train to the wonderful promise land. As soon as they get there, they start having the time of their lives. Soon after they arrive, they slowly start to realize that this hostel is hiding a terrible and dark secret.
